radiographic_examinations.findings: Trace bilateral pleural effusions, minimal atelectasis at the right base, extensive dense coronary artery calcifications, aortic valve calcifications, 3.2-cm round fluid density lesion in the right kidney likely representing a simple cyst, 5.4-cm fluid density lesion in the right kidney likely representing a cyst, mild wall thickening of the ascending colon with adjacent stranding likely secondary to recent polypectomy, distended gallbladder with mild adjacent stranding and fluid, small hyperdense stone in the gallbladder, right-sided fat-containing inguinal hernia, moderate arterial atherosclerotic calcifications, degenerative changes in the spine.
